member.name: T:MGroup.Constitutive.ConvectionDiffusion.ConvectionDiffusionDof
member.summary: Degree of freedom corresponding to the uknown coefficient at a single point. Implements enum pattern. Authors: Orestis Papas, Christodoulou Theofilos.

member.name: F:MGroup.Constitutive.ConvectionDiffusion.ConvectionDiffusionDof.UnknownVariable
member.summary: This dof corresponds to the unknown coefficient.

member.name: M:MGroup.Constitutive.ConvectionDiffusion.ConvectionDiffusionProperties.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructs a new material for the purposes of heat transfer applications. This material is characterized by the following properties: specific heat, thermal conductivity and material density
member.param: coefficient of the first time derivative term.
coefficent of the convection term, multiplied by the velocity vector
coefficient of the dependent term of the linear source.
coefficient of the independent term of the linear source.

member.name: T:MGroup.Constitutive.ConvectionDiffusion.IConvectionDiffusionProperties
member.summary: Contains material properties used for problems. These are uniform for the whole element and immutable. Authors: Orestis Papas, Christodoulou Theofilos.
